page.title: 16SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: It should be noted that in the whole of this area there is no Hyper Market and not even a really large Super Market. Shops appear right along 2 of the major roads:- A50 and B5366 (Saffron Lane) where they pick up custom from passing traffic as well as from local people; but the A426 shops are concentrated in the area of Old Ayleston village while the A46 in this area is all houses. The largest concentration of shops is on 'Queens Road' and is NOT on a major Trunk Road. It has a reputation for quality and was set up to serve{Clarendon Park and{Knighton}when they were built. In the main residential areas, small local shops still exist on their own or in small groups of 3 or 4. These tend to sell food and essentials or to be Newsagents, Off Licences or Take Away Hot Food Shops.
